trans:
23/09/2023
Hello Dr. Mehmet,I have heard a lot about your success from my close friends. I am [redacted_info] years old and I am writing to you from [redacted_info]. I also want to have a child. How can I reach you? Could you please help us?
[redacted_name]
21/09/2023
Yesssâ€¦ The main hero of a beautiful beginning, Onder SAKIN.. ğŸ¥° He is the one doctor who truly deserves the greatest thanks. Believe me, calling him just a doctor is an understatement, he is like an older brother, a younger sibling, a family memberâ€¦ In short, words cannot describe him. Throughout all the challenges of this difficult journey, he was there with his big heart and, of course, his expertise, guiding us in every way and never leaving us halfway on this path. And the hero has a wonderful, beautiful, and understanding nurse, Melis, who listens, understands everything, and answers every question without ever saying "no." ğŸ¥° The fact that they are just a phone call away also deserves special thanks. To all prospective mothers and fathers who want to start treatment, my recommendation is to absolutely try it under the guidance of Dr. ONDER SAKIN at the Istanbul/Bahceci (Unut Tup Bebek) Center. I believe that, first with God's help, and then by entrusting yourselves to these capable hands without fear or hesitation, you will succeed. Dear doctor and the lovely nurse Melis, I offer you my endless gratitude. We love you and wish you continued success. Stay with love. ğŸ™ğŸ’ğŸŒº
